body: This black card spells instant disaster. The character's body continues to function, as though comatose, but her psyche is trapped in a prison somewhere—in an object on a far plane or planet, possibly in the possession of an outsider. A wish or a miracle does not bring the character back, instead merely revealing the plane of entrapment. Draw no more cards.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Deck of Many Things/Description/The Void
name: The Void
